mapper.select: select id, menu_id, menu_name, to_menu_id, to_menu_name, menu_state, creater, modifier, create_time, modify_time from conference_apply.menu_info where id = #{id}
select id, menu_id, menu_name, to_menu_id, to_menu_name, menu_state, creater, modifier, create_time, modify_time from conference_apply.menu_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into conference_apply.menu_info(menu_id, menu_name, to_menu_id, to_menu_name, menu_state, creater, modifier, create_time, modify_time) values (#{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{toMenuId}, #{toMenuName}, #{menuState}, #{creater}, #{modifier}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime})

insert into conference_apply.menu_info(menu_id, menu_name, to_menu_id, to_menu_name, menu_state, creater, modifier, create_time, modify_time) values
(#{entity.menuId}, #{entity.menuName}, #{entity.toMenuId}, #{entity.toMenuName}, #{entity.menuState}, #{entity.creater}, #{entity.modifier}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime})

insert into conference_apply.menu_info(menu_id, menu_name, to_menu_id, to_menu_name, menu_state, creater, modifier, create_time, modify_time) values
(#{entity.menuId}, #{entity.menuName}, #{entity.toMenuId}, #{entity.toMenuName}, #{entity.menuState}, #{entity.creater}, #{entity.modifier}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime})
on duplicate key update menu_id = values(menu_id) , menu_name = values(menu_name) , to_menu_id = values(to_menu_id) , to_menu_name = values(to_menu_name) , menu_state = values(menu_state) , creater = values(creater) , modifier = values(modifier) , create_time = values(create_time) , modify_time = values(modify_time)
mapper.update:
update conference_apply.menu_info
menu_id = #{menuId},
menu_name = #{menuName},
to_menu_id = #{toMenuId},
to_menu_name = #{toMenuName},
menu_state = #{menuState},
creater = #{creater},
modifier = #{modifier},
create_time = #{createTime},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
where id = #{id}
